title: Very Simple Watch
summary: A simple watchface. The time. The date. The day. That's it.
description: I just wanted a really simple watch face. So I made one. Source is here: https://github.com/agawley/VSWAndroid
descriptionHTML: I just wanted a really simple watch face. So I made one. Source is here: https://github.com/agawley/VSWAndroid
comments: Great watch face Exactly what I wanted.   A simple watch face showing all info.  Sometimes people can over complicate a watch face.
The one I wanted This is simple and the one I wanted. Thank you very much :)
Great and simple Great and simple watchface, perfect for timekeeping at a glance.
